Today on the Dingle Peninsula, it's looking solid with 8 ft @10s W swell and a moderate 12 mph WSW wind. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both working well from 08:43 to 16:24. Tomorrow, expect similar conditions with 8 ft @12s W swell and a light 13 mph SSW wind, keeping spots like Ballybunion Left and Mossies in play. Day after, winds pick up to 32 mph SSW, making it blown out and poor across the board. Best: today.
